results.name: Number of tilings of an 8 X n rectangle using straight (3 X 1) trominoes and 2 X 2 tiles.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..100
example: a(2) = 4, because there are 4 tilings of an 8 X 2 rectangle using straight (3 X 1) trominoes and 2 X 2 tiles:
results.author: _Alois P. Heinz_, Dec 02 2012
